skillTree.name: Shield of Isha
skillTree.description: The Mother protects her forest-dwelling children, wrapping them in an ethereal blanket, hardening them against their foes.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 5% during forest battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Flurry of Boughs
skillTree.description: When at war under the canopy it is like the trees themselves join the fray, striking from all directions.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma
skillTree.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

skillTree.name: The Penumbral Pendulum
skillTree.description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

skillTree.name: The Withering
skillTree.description: The Wizard destroys their enemies from within, corroding foes' minds with doubt and crisis.

skillTree.name: Awakening of the Wood
skillTree.description: Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.

skillTree.name: Earth Blood
skillTree.description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached

skillTree.name: Shield of Thorns
skillTree.description: Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

skillTree.name: Smoke & Mirrors
skillTree.description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Endurance of the Oak
skillTree.description: Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.

skillTree.name: Impenetrable Bark
skillTree.description: Using the forest itself as a shield, this Lord is protected by their devotion to Athel Loren.

skillTree.name: Tempered Rigour
skillTree.description: When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.

skillTree.name: Violent Delights
skillTree.description: There is no greater thrill than to be in the midst of battle, slaughtering in the forest's name.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Call of the Woods
skillTree.description: The Lord embodies the forest; as a result of this, their warriors feel a greater call to defend it.

skillTree.name: Howl of the Forest
skillTree.description: The Lord's troops are charged to fight for Athel Loren, for their very souls are tethered to its fate.

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Lamentation of Despairs
backgroundSkills.description: The Despairs are among the most feared Spites within Athel Loren, their arrival always foretelling imminent death.

ui_effects.description: Strikes any combatants in its path

backgroundSkills.name: Annoyance of Netlings
backgroundSkills.description: Scurrying over their host with feverish abandon, Netlings snag the weapons of enemies that come too close with webs of magical filaments.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

backgroundSkills.name: Blight of Terrors
backgroundSkills.description: Mirthfully looming out from their host, Terrors take on their most fearsome aspect to dampen the spirits of their horrified prey.

backgroundSkills.name: Muster of Malevolents
backgroundSkills.description: Unleashed upon a foe, these aggressive manifestations of the forest are utilised for their needle-like arrows that inflict painful wounds from afar.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target

backgroundSkills.name: Befuddlement of Mischiefs
backgroundSkills.description: The staring eyes and tattered wings of tiny, glowing Elves befuddle enemy minds, sending them into a sleep-like trance.

backgroundSkills.name: Cluster of Radiants
backgroundSkills.description: Radiants are sponges for magical energy, manifesting as little more than blurred shapes of pure light that beckon the Winds to their host.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: +2 for all enemy spells
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Murder of Spites
backgroundSkills.description: Hiding in their hosts' hollows are fiendish forms, ready to strike out at any who draw near.

backgroundSkills.name: Pageant of Shrikes
backgroundSkills.description: Shrikes take on various frightening forms, moving like quicksilver to target the eyes, and even enter foesâ€™ bodies to attack their very minds.

backgroundSkills.name: Resplendence of Luminescents
backgroundSkills.description: Bounding from branch to bow, the Luminescentsâ€™ magical spoors alight upon alliesâ€™ weapons to bestow a minor but lethal enchantment.

effects.description:
Spell resistance: -25%
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Mystifying Miasma [HIDDEN]
backgroundSkills.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.
